TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PingCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此类的实例将传递给 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventHandler> 调用完成时调用的方法 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A> 。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.SendAsync%2A>方法以异步方式 () ICMP 发送 Internet 控制消息协议，并等待相应的 ICMP 回送答复消息。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs.Reply%2A>属性包含 ICMP 回送请求的结果。
## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以异步方式发送 ICMP 回显请求。
[!code-cpp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CPP/asyncping.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NclPingAsync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CS/asyncping.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Reply As PingReply

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

Docs.summary: 获取包含数据的对象，该数据描述发送 Internet 控制消息协议 (ICMP) 回送请求消息并接受相应的 ICMP 回送答复消息的尝试。
Docs.value: 一个 对象，描述 ICMP 回送请求结果。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果的值 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Status%2A> 不是 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.IPStatus.Success> ，则不应使用 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A> 、 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> 和属性返回的值 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> 。 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.RoundtripTime%2A>和 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Buffer%2A> 属性将返回零， <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingReply.Options%2A> 属性将返回 `null` 。
## Examples 下面的代码示例实现了用于响应事件的方法 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.Ping.PingCompleted> 。 有关完整的示例，请参阅 <xref:System.Net.NetworkInformation.PingCompletedEventArgs> 类概述。
[!code-cpp[NclPingAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CPP/asyncping.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[NclPingAsync#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclPingAsync/CS/asyncping.cs#4)]
